attributes.action: Force Town Planners To Consider The Environment When Allowing Housing Developments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its very easy for the Government to say that households need to reduce their energy usage, and very expensive for householders, however when Town Planners have the opportunity to impose environmental measures to new housing developments such as rainwater reuse, window shading, CHP, windpower turbines, photovoltaics etc. upon developers they don't to any degree. 

It is very expensive to retrospectively install this technology, so to include at construction stage would seem sensible.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
